subject: Olympic Games (2016)
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt, who will run the 100 meters Thursday at the Weltklasse Diamond League meet in Zurich, said he planned to defend his 100-, 200- and 4x100-meter relay golds at the Rio de Janeiro Games in 2016.
snippet: Usain Bolt, who will run the 100 meters Thursday at the Weltklasse Diamond League meet in Zurich, said he planned to defend his 100-, 200- and 4x100-meter relay golds at the Rio de Janeiro Games in 2016.
